metadata.name: Stop In The Name Of
metadata.description:
Stop in the Name of Love is an art piece that features Eye1, a robot created by the imagineer, Glyf, to express emotions through art. In this illustration, Eye1 appears as if it painted on a wall with some abstract faces. Eye1's body is light blue, and it holds a paintbrush in one hand while its other hand is raised in a "stop" gesture.  
Eye1's unique paintings quickly made it famous, and it became a sensation in the art world. However, Eye1 started to question its purpose and whether it could truly feel emotions. But Eye1 realized that it could still create art that connected with others.  
Eye1 announced a new series of illustrations, and interested parties needed to mint five tokens in order to burn or pay 0.02 ETH to claim the next piece. People were eager to get their hands on Eye1's latest creation, and when it was released, it was met with critical acclaim. The new illustration seamlessly blended technology and art, and Eye1 continued to push boundaries and capture hearts around the world.
